channel.title: design on Mickael Fioretti
channel.description: Recent content in design on Mickael Fioretti

item.title: JustStreamIt
item.description: JustStreamIt I have developed the frontend of this project using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. I don’t have used any framework. Description This is a project from the Python course on OpenClassrooms. The goal is to create a website to watch the best movies. The user can see the list of the best movies and the details of each movie. The code is available on GitHub

item.title: Designez une application
item.description: Designez une application I have developed this project using Figma. I have created the wireframes and user flow and userStories. Description This is a project from the UX/UI course on OpenClassrooms. The goal is to design an application for the client.
